simulateTransferThread :: Account -> Map Int Account -> (Int, Int) -> IO () Source #

Simulate transfering from one account to another in a single thread

step 1, select random accounts ，create thread step 2, random amount 10 to 50, and transfer

Produced by Haddock version 2.23.0
